Product.title: Chogan™ Mattock Tomahawk
Product.description:
This timeless tool is ready for new adventures.

From the trenches of WWI comes the Chogan™ Mattock, a tool purpose-built for portability. Based on the common digging tool used by British infantry, the head can be removed from the handle for compact storage in the included woven nylon carrying sheath to stash in your vehicle, on a backpack, or in your tool shed. What’s more, that same handle is compatible with the tomahawk head from the Chogan™ T-Hawk, giving you the option to wield two tools with one handle for either more versatility or redundancy.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Axes,Shop All,All products excluding UPP,Exclusives

Product.title: Squid™ Compact
Product.description:
This small knife is a big deal.

The Squid™ is known as the perfect everyday carry knife, expertly combining simplicity, usability, and performance. Neither brash nor flashy, it’s the humble light-duty truck of the knife world — dependable, rock solid, and remarkably capable. Now, renowned designer Lucas Burnley has reforged it into a smaller, more agile version in the Squid™ Compact. This affordable folding knife is an everyday carry for everybody.

For anyone who lusted after Kinematic® opening but didn’t need a karambit, now you can get the same innovative tech in a knife designed for everyday carry. The Provoke® EDC features a new plain-edge blade made from D2 steel for excellent edge retention and a lightweight aluminum handle that allows it to ride comfortably in a pocket.

Ryan Johnson of RMJ Tactical in Chattanooga, TN designed The Woods Chogan™ T-Hawk. A specialist in applying modern engineering to centuries old tool and weapon concepts, he is upping the ante once again with a new outdoor line of tomahawks that swing as big as the open wilderness where they’re found.

Product.title: M16®-10KZ Tanto

If It Still Looks This Good a Year From Now, We Want It Back.

The M16® Z everyday carry series was designed by Vine Grove, Kentucky's legendary custom knifemaker and retired Sgt. Major Harold "Kit" Carson. After years of crafting knives for military use, he answered the call when it came to creating one for the civilian population. Now people everywhere have a blade that’s ready for the line of duty in whatever capacity they see fit.

Product.title: Septimo™ Multi-Tool
Product.description:
Born of Flames. Seriously.

The Septimo™ Multi-Tool is a tactical to everyday carry crossover designed by a seasoned Green Beret to be more than a convenience—he forged it of experience to serve as a lifeline.

Jeremy Valdez's charity of choice for this knife is the Green Beret Foundation. .


Established in 2016, the Forged by War® program spearheaded a collaboration between CRKT and Veterans, inviting real life warriors to apply their knowledge and experience to design a specialty line of mission-ready knives and tools. In addition to receiving commission on their designs, a portion of the profits are donated to the Veterans’ charity of choice. CRKT is proud to offer this dedicated collection to support the participating charities on a national level.

Product.title: K.I.S.S.® Keep. It. Super. Simple.
Product.description:

The Original K.I.S.S.® blade shape is Tanto-inspired—Chisel-Point grind on the front and flat on the backside—so that when the blade is closed onto its handle/frame, the precision fit effectively "seals" the cutting edge to the frame, even though it's exposed. Both Razor-Sharp and Combined Razor-Sharp and Triple-Point™ Serrated edge grinds are available. Both blade and frame are 3CR13 stainless steel in a fine bead-blast finish.

The deep beard echoes Viking style. But its balance and pure burliness boosts it into a contemporary league all its own. Shield and Viking battle cry not included.


Elmer Roush's charity of choice for this knife is the Green Beret Foundation.


Established in 2016, the Forged by War® program spearheaded a collaboration between CRKT and Veterans, inviting real life warriors to apply their knowledge and experience to design a specialty line of mission-ready knives and tools. In addition to receiving commission on their designs, a portion of the profits are donated to the Veterans’ charity of choice. CRKT is proud to offer this dedicated collection to support the participating charities on a national level.

Jeremy Valdez's charity of choice for this knife is the Green Beret Foundation. .

A thick, carbon steel blade has a black powder coat that is durable in extreme environments. The Chanceinhell™ is a beefy fixed blade survival machete designed by award-winning custom knife-maker Ken Onion of Kaneohe, HI to be tough, strong, and work like an ox. Product.title: K.I.S.S.® Keep. It. Super. Simple.
Product.description:
There's nothing like the real thing.

The Original K.I.S.S.®, with its Tanto-inspired blade and bead-blast finish, is the revolutionary high-tech statement by Knifemakers' Guild member and K.I.S.S.® designer "Daddy K.I.S.S." Ed Halligan. It stands for "Keep It Super Simple."

The Original K.I.S.S.® blade shape is Tanto-inspired—Chisel-Point grind on the front and flat on the backside—so that when the blade is closed onto its handle/frame, the precision fit effectively "seals" the cutting edge to the frame, even though it's exposed. Both Razor-Sharp and Combined Razor-Sharp and Triple-Point™ Serrated edge grinds are available. Both blade and frame are 3CR13 stainless steel in a fine bead-blast finish.

The design of the K.I.S.S.® series pocket/money clip permits them to be used in a variety of ways: clipped to the pocket; as a money clip knife; and with split-ring or lanyard, as a key chain knife.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,On Sale,All products excluding UPP,Pocket

Designer Ryan Johnson of RMJ Tactical in Chattanooga, TN has been honing his tactical tomahawk designs for over 30 years earning him a dedicated and loyal fan base, particularly among special forces troops. Now, he’s building an even bigger following with his latest offering: The Kangee™ T-Hawk.

Product.title: Minimalist® Drop Point Sheath
Product.description:
Need a sheath for your knife? We've got you covered.

Built out of a tough and durable vacuum-formed thermoplastic, this sheath will keep your blade safely stored until called upon for duty. The sheath fully protects the knife blade and secures to your liking with multiple carry options.
Product.categories: Drop Point Sheath,Minimalist,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Techliner™ Super Shorty Pen
Product.description: Your job’s too important for a drugstore pen. Bring along a pen that sticks around. The Techliner™ Super Shorty pen is a new take on the can’t-go-without-it original. It’s built to impress with a sleek, ergonomically machined body and magnetic ends that stick solidly to clipboards, desk legs, and workbenches so it’s always within arm’s reach.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Accessories,Shop All,On Sale,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Shenanigan™ Assisted
Product.description:
Shenanigan is the name. Dependable is the game.

CRKT® reintroduces the classic Shenanigan™ Series, the everyday workhorse folding knives designed by world renowned knife designer, Ken Onion. Featuring Ken’s award-winning Assisted Opening innovation and IKBS™ ball bearing pivot system for smooth opening, the knife’s prominent flipper deploys the 3.35” drop point blade between maroon, glass-reinforced nylon handles. Despite what the name might imply, this classic line is here to get the job done.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Out of Stock

Product.title: Butte Deadbolt®
Product.description:
A modern classic from a legendary designer.

Named for the hills that surround designer Lucas Burnley’s hometown of Bend, Oregon, the Butte is a folding knife that takes styling cues from standard hunting knives. Burnley calls it a “modern classic,” integrating traditional looks with the latest materials and features—including Deadbolt®, a first for a Burnley knife.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Testy™ Fixed
Product.description:
A fiery featherweight.

It might be a compact carry, but don’t let its small size fool you. A powerful, versatile fixed blade design, the Testy™ was made by designer Jeff Park to tackle outdoor chores, and everyday challenges. Featuring a drop point blade, this knife packs a big personality to go with it. Users beware, you might feel extra fiery after welding it.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,On Sale,Out of Stock

Product.title: Minimalist® Bowie Sheath
Product.description:
Need a sheath for your knife? We've got you covered.

Built out of a tough and durable vacuum-formed thermoplastic, this sheath will keep your blade safely stored until called upon for duty. The sheath fully protects the knife blade and secures to your liking with multiple carry options.
Product.categories: Bowie Sheath,Minimalist,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Woods Kangee™ T-Hawk Sheath
Product.description:
Need a beautiful hand crafted leather sheath for your CRKT® Woods Kangee™ T-Hawk? We've got you covered.

The leather on this sheath is 6/7 oz. full-grained leather that is heavy duty and hand crafted in the USA. The leather is vegetable tanned and will not corrode metal. It has a hand oiled finish for durability and the seams are locked stitched with heavy weight nylon thread. The sheath protects the axe head and fits snugly and securely with two snaps. The belt loop fits belts with widths up to 1 ¾ inches.

This sheath only fits the CRKT Woods Kangee™ T-Hawk.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Chogan™ Hatchet Sheath
Product.description:
Need a beautiful hand crafted leather sheath for your axe? We've got you covered.

This full-grained heavy duty leather sheath edge mask is hand crafted in the USA. It has a hand oiled finish for durability and will not corrode metal.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Razel™ Compact Fixed
Product.description:
The perfect blend of form and function.

The Razel® Compact takes designer Jon Graham’s fixed-blade knife and adds versatility while reducing size. Brutalist and elegant at the same time, the D2 steel blade balances Veff Flat Top Serrations®, a front chisel, and a gently curved leading edge, all coming together in a pocket fixed blade that can be used for cutting rope, scraping, and slicing.
Product.categories: Compact Fixed,Razel,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: LCK + Assisted
Product.description:
Blink and you’ll miss it.

The LCK + is lightning fast and ready for anything. Compact and powerful, the LCK + everyday carry folding knife is built around the Assisted Opening innovation for extremely fast deployment speeds. Pack some heat.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Drifter Liner Lock
Product.description:
A premium spin on a hardworking knife.

The original Drifter is a go-to everyday carry, a knife that can take a beating and won’t let you down. Now upgraded with 12C27 blade steel and Veff Serrations™, this new version features improved edge retention and the ability to easily cut through rope or other fibrous material. Paired with a micarta handle, it is strong, comfortable, and looks incredible in a new all-black finish.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Pocket,Shop All,Folding Knives,UPP

Product.title: S.P.E.C.™ (Small. Pocket. Everyday. Cleaver.)
Product.description:
The power-packed contender for cutting.

Chopping, slicing, or dicing, the S.P.E.C.™ (SMALL. POCKET. EVERYDAY. CLEAVER.) takes care of your cutting needs on the go. Designed by knifemaker Alan Folts, this portable knife is a coveted staple for camp kitchens, woodworking, and miscellaneous tasks in the garage. Inspired by the mighty butcher cleaver made for the chopping block, this reimagined knife doesn’t let its portable size hold it back.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Scribe™ Fixed
Product.description:
Crafted for the corner office.

Covert is the name of the game when it comes to the Scribe™ everyday carry fixed blade knife. Instead of a sheath, this shirt-pocket sized knife slips into a cap with a satisfying click, just like your favorite pen, until it’s time to slice open a package or trim a loose thread.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Pocket,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,Fathers Day,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Inazuma No Ken™ Deadbolt®
Product.description:
Strikes like lightning.

Knifemaker James Williams’ longstanding history and knowledge of hand-to-hand combat sets the bar for his tactical knife creations—and the Inazuma No Ken™ is no exception to the rule. Inspired by the Otanashi noh Ken™ and the Hissatsu™ Folder, James brings us another Japanese-inspired knife with a name that translates to “lightning sword.” Merging three remarkable innovations—Ken Onion’s Assisted Opening and Flavio Ikoma’s IKBS™ Ball Bearing Pivot System and Deadbolt® lock—stand back as it quickly and smoothly deploys, locking into place to withstand even the toughest jobs. You’ll see soon enough how it’s rightfully earned its namesake.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Gift Guide

Product.title: Odr™ Axe
Product.description:
A multitool in an axe, sent from the gods.

With its dual-purpose head that features a standard axe blade on one side and a spike on the other, the Odr™ chops like an axe and breaks ground like a pick. It’s a versatile tool to have on hand at camp or home, perfect for splitting wood or breaking through rocky earth.

Elmer Roush's charity of choice for this axe is the Green Beret Foundation.

Established in 2016, the Forged by War® program spearheaded a collaboration between CRKT and Veterans, inviting real life warriors to apply their knowledge and experience to design a specialty line of mission-ready knives and tools. In addition to receiving commission on their designs, a portion of the profits are donated to the Veterans’ charity of choice. CRKT is proud to offer this dedicated collection to support the participating charities on a national level.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Axes,Shop All,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.title: Woods Chogan™ T-Hawk Sheath
Product.description:
Need a beautiful hand crafted leather sheath for your CRKT® Woods Chogan™ T-Hawk? We've got you covered.

The leather on this sheath is 6/7 oz. full-grained leather that is heavy duty and hand crafted in the USA. The leather is vegetable tanned and will not corrode metal. It has a hand oiled finish for durability and the seams are locked stitched with heavy weight nylon thread. The sheath protects the axe head and fits snugly and securely with three snaps. The belt loop fits belts with widths up to 1 ¾ inches.

This sheath only fits the Woods Chogan™ T-Hawk.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Facet™ Flipper
Product.description:
Minimalism with a hint of extravagance.

The Facet™ Viral is one of two premium editions of Ken Onion’s classic and understated Facet™ folding knife. Made in Italy, it combines the timeless design of Ken’s original custom with upgraded materials over the previous CRKT version and a laser-engraved viral fractal pattern on the titanium handle for a knife that will draw just a little more attention.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,UPP,New Releases,Fathers Day

Product.title: Pry Cutter Keychain Tool
Product.description:
The keychain carry that tackles on-the-go tasks.

This compact keychain multitool is small enough to take with you everywhere; a utilitarian solution to jobs on the go. Part of Joe Wu’s Scout Tools collection, the Pry Cutter Keychain Tool™ features several key components from a cord cutter to a bit driver tool, making it as essential as the keys you carry with it.
Product.categories: Accessories,Shop All,On Sale,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Overland™ Compact
Product.description:
The compact folding knife ready to tackle any terrain.

It may be small, but just like the souped-up 4x4 rigs that inspired its name, the Overland™ Compact is overbuilt and ready to perform in the roughest conditions. It takes the design cues and materials of the full-size Overland™ and puts them into an ultra-portable form factor that practically disappears in a pocket. When it’s time to stop the convoy and set up camp, this knife makes short work of light food prep and whittles the perfect marshmallow stick.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Freya™ Axe Replacement Handle
Product.description: Are you a brute and your untamed chopping power broke your CRKT® Freya™ handle? No problem. We have the replacement handle for your CRKT® T-Hawk right here. This Tennessee hickory handle is the replacement handle for the Freya™. It's made in the USA, twice burned, stained, and boiled linseed oil applied for durability when you're in the backcountry.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Replacement Handle,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.title: Woods Chogan™ T-Hawk Replacement Handle
Product.description: Are you a brute and your untamed chopping power broke your CRKT® Woods T-Hawk handle? No problem. We have the replacement handle for your CRKT® T-hawk right here. This Tennessee hickory handle is the replacement handle for the Woods Chogan T-Hawk and the Woods Kangee T-hawk. It's made in the USA and sealed with a lacquer coat that adds durability when you're in the backcountry.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Replacement Handle,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Stylus™ Assisted
Product.description:
When we say sharp, we don’t just mean the blade.

Designed by world renowned knife designer, Ken Onion, the Stylus™ presents a dash of class with its sleek, slim profile, fit for any pocket. Alas, a true gentleman’s knife, balancing both style and function.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.description: Are you a brute and your untamed chopping power broke your CRKT® Freyr Axe? No problem. We have the replacement handle for your CRKT® axe right here. This Tennessee hickory handle is the replacement handle for the Freyr Axe. It's made in the USA and sealed with a lacquer coat that adds durability when you're in the backcountry.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Replacement Handle,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.description:
Need leather sheath for your CRKT Odr?

We've got you covered with this USA-made, full grain leather sheath made for the CRKT Odr.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Shop All,Accessories,Sheaths,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.title: Bugsy™ Fixed
Product.description:
The first CRKT knife from custom knifemaker and survivalist Kaila Cumings, the Bugsy™ is a premium compact fixed-blade available in two versions to respond to the different needs of the outdoor enthusiast.

Choose either a stonewash plain-edge blade, Micarta handle, with a leather sheath; or a black Cerakote-coated blade with Veff Serrations™, matching black G10 handle, and Kydex sheath.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,UPP,New Releases,Made in USA,Gift Guide

Product.title: Jake Liner Lock
Product.description:
Back by popular demand. The Jake is Ken Onion’s gift to the knife enthusiast world.

The highly-requested design is named after one of Ken’s longtime fans and built to be the perfect everyday carry. Balancing strength and portability, it combines a 3.3-inch drop-point blade with a lightweight handle for a do-everything knife that excels wherever and however you use it, including when showing it off to your friends.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: HZ6 Fixed
Product.description:
Made for the modern warrior.

Paying tribute to the hira-zukuri—a classical Japanese straight sword—knifemaker James Williams brings us the HZ6. Hailing from the 8th century, the original hira-zukuri style blade was first popularized in daggers and utilized as a powerful “short” sword for survival and everyday use. And just like its origin, the HZ6 is purpose-built for real life warriors, only now designed to meet the demands of the modern world.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Hirin™ Liner Lock
Product.description:
Centuries of tradition meets infinite imagination.

One look at the Hirin™ is all it takes to know it’s something special. The detailed acid-etch pattern of the Super Dense Twist™ Damasteel® blade. The anodized titanium handle and bead-blasted stainless steel screws. The striking skeleton construction, both organic and otherworldly. Even the bespoke pocket clip, also Damasteel®, perfectly complements the knife’s sleek, symmetrical shape.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP,Exclusives,Gift Guide

Product.title: Tuna Compact
Product.description:
The small fish that rules any pond.

Though small, the Tuna™ Compact evokes the power of one of the world’s largest and fastest fish. It takes the subtle elegance of designer Lucas Burnley’s original Tuna™ and shrinks it down into an ultra-compact folding knife. With a profile that suggests strong forward momentum and a blade shape that looks like a deep-sea carnivore, this everyday carry slices through packages and boxes faster than a Bluefin slices through the swell on a taut line.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Razel™ Chisel
Product.description:
Stripped down to the bare necessities.

Sometimes, the best tool for the job is the simplest. The Razel™ Chisel is a fixed blade for your pocket that takes a no-frills approach to Jon Graham’s iconic original design. Made of high-carbon steel and using a chisel grind that’s sharpened on a single side, the blade is incredibly easy to resharpen. The bare metal handle keeps weight to a minimum while the included cord fob extends the grip for better control.
Product.categories: Chisel,Razel,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,On Sale

Product.title: S.P.I.T.™ (Small. Pocket. Inverted. Tanto.)
Product.description:
A good knife doesn’t need to be complicated.

The S.P.I.T.™ (Small. Pocket. Inverted. Tanto.) is a variation of the beloved S.P.E.W.™ (Small. Pocket. Everyday. Wharncliffe.), designed by Alan Folts of Melbourne, Florida. With a shorter fixed blade than its cousin, the S.P.I.T.™ features enhanced portability, but it keeps the large handle for extra leverage when cutting.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Freya™ Axe Sheath
Product.description: Well Built: Made in the USA. High Quality: Durable full grained leather sheath. Expert Crafted: Featuring hand oiled finish for durability

Product.title: Skeggox Axe
Product.description:
Own the outdoors with this go-anywhere, do-anything axe.

Named after its 1st-century Norse forebear, the Skeggox is a compact bearded axe built to withstand the test of time. Designed by James Williams, this modern incarnation uses a full tang for exceptional strength and SK-5 carbon steel for superior edge retention. Go ahead, make the Vikings jealous.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Axes,Shop All,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Kova™ Front Lock
Product.description:
A classic with a tough edge.

The name Kova™ springs from Finnish origin, meaning “tough, hard, or demanding a lot of effort to endure.” Designed by veteran knife designer, Ken Steigerwalt, the front lock folding knife’s strength and durability isn’t just in the name, it’s how it rises to face everyday tasks and challenges.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Williams Defense Pen Grivory®
Product.description:
Meet a whole new kind of pocket protector.

Keep it in your backpack, purse, pocket, or anywhere you normally carry a pen, because that’s exactly what it is. Everyone else will see it as a stylish writing instrument—and they won’t be wrong—but you’ll know that it’s more than that. Should the need arise, the Williams Defense Pen is ready to strike.
Product.categories: Grivory,Williams Defense Pen,Pocket,Accessories,Shop All,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Curfew™ Assisted
Product.description:
Doesn’t abide by curfews.

Great design often comes from unexpected moments. So when knifemaker Russ Kommer’s eight-year-old granddaughter showed him one of her rough sketches, the two began plugging away in Russ’ workshop to refine it into the Curfew™. A sleek everyday carry, this folding knife deploys the blade smoothly and quickly thanks to Ken Onion’s award-winning Assisted Opening. While its original inspiration comes from someone young enough to have a curfew, this knife definitely isn’t bound by one.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Scribe™ Fixed
Product.description:
Hiding in plain sight.
You might think the Scribe™ is a sleek USB drive, but you’d be mistaken. Instead of a sheath, this everyday carry fixed blade neatly snaps into a cap to conceal the black stonewash drop point blade. When in use, the cap securely attaches to the pummel of the knife—extending the handle for better purchase. The tough D2 blade steel and black stonewash pocket clip make the Scribe™ a discreet carry companion ready for anything. Only available at CRKT.com.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Pocket,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,Exclusives,Gift Guide

Product.title: Foresight™ Assisted
Product.description:
You won’t know where the blade ends and your hand begins.

This tactically-inspired everyday carry urban tactical knife proves that form follows function with swept finger grooves, a formidable blade, and the Assisted Opening innovation. Whatever the need, you’re good to go through anything with this bad boy of a blade.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Provoke® Sheath
Product.description:
Need a sheath for your Provoke® knife? We've got you covered.

Built out of a tough and durable vacuum-formed thermoplastic, this sheath will keep your hawk-bill blade safely stored in the nest until provoked. The sheath comes with a gear-compatible clip set that addresses belt and tactical necessities. The sheath fully protects the knife blade and secures to your liking with multiple clip and carry options. This sheath fits the Provoke® knife. Fits all Provoke® knife models excluding Compact (4045) and EDC (4050) Versions.
Product.categories: Sheath,Provoke,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,UPP

Product.title: Razel™ Fixed
Product.description:
Based on the original design by Jon Graham, a mechanic turned knifemaker, the Razel™ is a powerful pocket fixed-blade knife built to handle the harsh daily conditions of shop life.

Its squared chisel blade gives it multi-tool qualities, enabling it to excel in a variety of conditions, including push cutting, scraping, and slicing.

Need a sheath for your Provoke® Compact knife? We've got you covered.

Built out of a tough and durable vacuum-formed thermoplastic, this sheath will keep your hawk-bill blade safely stored in the nest until provoked. The sheath comes with a gear-compatible clip set that addresses belt and tactical necessities. The sheath fully protects the knife blade and secures to your liking with multiple clip and carry options. This sheath fits the 4045 Provoke® Compact knife.
Product.categories: Compact Sheath,Provoke,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,UPP

Product.title: Ripsnort™ II Liner Lock
Product.description:
The Ripsnort™ Returns.

Following in the footsteps of the original Ripsnort™, designer Philip Booth ushers in the next chapter with the Ripsnort™ II. The cleaver style blade is slightly larger than the original, yet still thin as a razor and ready for hard use. Matching the original in performance, the Ripsnort™ II continues to be a fan-favorite carry with more power packed into a folding knife design. It won’t be hard to make a solid impression with the Ripsnort™ II—this low-profile folding knife stands out in style and function.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Venandi™ Slip Joint
Product.description:
The hunt is over.

Knifemaker Richard Rogers goes back to his roots of creating timeless, simple, yet sophisticated designs. And the Venandi™ is exactly that. Dubbed a Latin name that translates to “hunter,” this classic slip joint folding knife features a clip point blade that’s strong enough to hold its own under pressure. Just big enough to tackle all types of jobs, the hunt to find a timeless, everyday carry is finally over.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Taco Viper® Sheath
Product.description:
Keeps your knife at hand when you need it the most.

Drawing from his experience in the 82nd Airborne, knife designer Antonio Rodriguez developed the Taco Viper® sheath to keep his knife close at hand and tethered during critical airborne missions. Made of tough woven nylon, the lightweight sheath features velcro to keep the sheath open for easy access, and a snap for secure closure. The sheath also comes with a carabiner and elastic cord to keep the knife attached during unstable conditions.

*Viper® is a registered trademark of AOB Products Company
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.title: Ritual™ Assisted
Product.description:
Jumping out of the history book and into your pocket.

Like an old-world Persian fixed blade, the Ritual™ tactical folding knife has a long, drastic blade curve and a substantial handle. But what makes it fit for a modern carry is the powerful Assisted Opening innovation that snaps open at lightning-fast speeds. It’s perfect for doing battle in ancient Persia and for making quick work of a package on your doorstep.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,On Sale,All products excluding UPP,Best Sellers

Product.title: Ramadi™ Fixed
Product.description:
A companion for every kind of expedition.

Designed by retired Sergeant Major Darrin William Sirois, the Ramadi™ is the dependable, tactical carry that’s sure to have your back. Sleek and strong, this knife knows how to navigate every mission at hand.

Darrin Sirois's charity of choice for this knife is the Purple Heart Homes.

Product.title: Clever Girl™ Kukri
Product.description:
As clever as it looks.

During his time stationed at Fort Polk while serving in the military, knifemaker Austin McGlaun was inspired to find new ways to tackle laborious camp chores. And so the Clever Girl™ Kukri was realized. A fixed blade design that honors the iconic kukri knife, this reimagined version still brandishes a mighty swing despite being more compact than its predecessor. As a member of the CRKT® Forged by War® program, the Kukri is tough enough to stand the test of the battlefield—and whatever else Mother Nature might throw your way.

Austin McGlaun's charity of choice for this knife is the Global War on Terrorism Memorial Foundation.

When your EDC thinks it’s a kubaton.

Product.description:
Raising the bar for everyday performance.

The LCBK, or Lightweight Crossbar Knife, is a high-end everyday carry distilled down to the essentials. No gimmicks, no games—just quality materials and craftsmanship that give you everything you need and nothing you don’t. One of the first CRKT knives to feature a Crossbar Lock, it’s fast, sturdy, and fully ambidextrous.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,UPP,Made in USA,Gift Guide

Product.title: Razel™ Nax
Product.description:
Built up to take on bigger tasks.

What do you get when you cross a knife with an axe? The answer is the Razel™ Nax. It takes the chisel blade of the standard Razel™ and scales it up, adding a long, full-tang handle to transform it into a hybrid tool like no other. Now you can push cut, scrape, slice, and chop with a single blade.
Product.categories: Nax,Razel,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Lanny Assisted
Product.description:
Built of nostalgia.

Inspired by the legendary Tony Bose’s custom Lanny's Clip, the Lanny™ everyday carry folding knife takes a classic slip joint style and brings it into the future with the Assisted Opening innovation for incredibly fast opening speeds. Call it your most nostalgic, yet futuristic carry.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,On Sale

Product.title: M4™-02M Drop Point
Product.description:
A fresh take on a classic.

The late, great knifemaker Kit Carson is widely known for his M16® design, but his most consistent selling custom model has been his classic M4™. This latest version, the M4™-02M, features a striking satin-finish blade and a handle made of white micarta with black G10 bolsters. It’s not just a great-looking M4™, it’s one of the classiest folding knives you can get.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Pocket

Product.title: Seis™ Liner Lock
Product.description:
Means six, but it does all the tricks.

Knifemaker Richard Rogers has been designing knives for more than two decades, bringing fans his popular Cuatro™ and Cinco™ designs. Counting up, he introduces the Seis™, the everyday folding pocket knife that’s big enough to do serious work, and compact enough for everyday use. Featuring IKBS™ for super smooth deployment, you won’t have to count to six to use it.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Hex Bit Driver Tool
Product.description:
Pint-sized fix-it power.

The Hex Bit Driver Tool is a pocket-sized version of your can’t-live-without-it shop favorite. Designed with an extra bearing for quick takedown and assembly and a surprisingly ergonomic grip for such a compact tool, it’s the smooth operator that your everyday carry has been waiting for.
Product.categories: Accessories,Shop All,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Berserker™ Axe Sheath
Product.description:
Need a beautiful hand crafted leather sheath for your axe? We've got you covered.

This full-grained heavy duty leather sheath edge mask is hand crafted in the USA. It has a hand oiled finish for durability and will not corrode metal.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Oxcart Assisted
Product.description:
Strong as an ox, this everyday carry knife won’t back down.

Whatever the day throws at you, the Oxcart is built to handle it. This design from Robert Carter features Assisted Opening and a frame lock in a durable stainless steel handle that can take a beating.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,Fathers Day,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Freyr™ Axe Sheath
Product.description:
Need a beautiful hand crafted leather sheath for your CRKT® Freyr™? We've got you covered.

This full-grained heavy duty leather sheath is hand crafted in the USA. The leather is vegetable tanned and will not corrode metal. It has a hand oiled finish for durability and the seams are lock stitched with heavy weight nylon thread. The sheath protects the axe head and fits snugly and securely with two snaps. The belt loop fits belts with widths up to 1 ¾ inches. This sheath only fits the Freyr™.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.title: Chogan™ Mattock Sheath
Product.description:
A versatile, rugged sheath built for the Chogan™ Mattock.

As durable as it is functional, this woven nylon sheath is designed to carry Chogan™ Mattock tool head and handle in a compact, secure package. Once the tool head is removed from the handle, both pieces are securely held in place in separate compartments in the sheath and tucked away in a backpack or vehicle to save space.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheath,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Catchall™ Fixed
Product.description:
Cuts through the worst case scenario.

Designed by knifemaker Russ Kommer, the Catchall™ gets its name from it’s ability to perform in a range of situations. A fixed blade design with sheepsfoot blade shape, this multifunctional tool isn’t just a handy camp kitchen knife, it’s a versatile outdoor must-have.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Taco Viper® Assisted
Product.description:
Ready to strike at a moment’s notice.

When a paratrooper is stuck on a static line, every millisecond counts. That’s the high-stakes situation that inspired the Taco Viper®, an Assisted Opening knife that springs to action in the blink of an eye.

Antonio Rodriguez's charity of choice for this knife is the Global War on Terrorism Memorial Foundation.

Established in 2016, the Forged by War® program spearheaded a collaboration between CRKT and Veterans, inviting real life warriors to apply their knowledge and experience to design a specialty line of mission-ready knives and tools. In addition to receiving commission on their designs, a portion of the profits are donated to the Veterans’ charity of choice. CRKT is proud to offer this dedicated collection to support the participating charities on a national level.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Shop All,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Forged By War

Product.title: Chogan™ Hammer Replacement Handle
Product.description: Are you a brute and your untamed chopping power broke your CRKT® Chogan™ Hammer handle? No problem. We have the Tennessee hickory replacement handle for your CRKT® T-Hawk right here. It's made in the USA, twice burned and buffed to add grip when you're in the backcountry.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Replacement Handle,Shop All,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Bugsy™ Sheath
Product.description:
Need Kydex sheath for your CRKT Bugsy?

We've got you covered with this USA-made, Kydex sheath made for the CRKT Bugsy.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Sheaths,Shop All,Accessories,New Releases,UPP

Product.title: CRKT® Micro Tool & Keychain Sharpener Multi-Tool
Product.description: Anyone who uses a knife regularly knows that having a sharp blade edge is much safer than trying to make a dull blade do the job. Designer Tom Stokes created this compact sharpener so it would be easy to have along, and keep you sharp.
Product.categories: Multi-Tools,Accessories,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: CEO Compact
Product.description:
The knife that’s headed straight to the top.

An upgrade over the standard CEO Compact, this model features a natural G10 handle and outstanding 14C28N blade for superior edge retention. With the same low-profile design as the original, it’s small enough to slide comfortably into a shirt pocket yet maintains the ergonomics and usability you expect from a high-end everyday carry.
Product.categories: Compact,CEO,Pocket,New Releases,Shop All,Folding Knives,UPP

Product.title: CEO Compact
Product.description:
A knife that’s dressed for success.

At first glance, it could be mistaken for a pen tucked into a shirt pocket. That’s exactly how the CEO folding knife was designed. It achieves an extremely low profile without cutting corners on usability and ergonomics. Now available with a black handle, this version brings a new level of refinement to the simple-but-sophisticated appearance the CEO is known for.
Product.categories: Compact,CEO,Pocket,New Releases,Shop All,Folding Knives,UPP,Fathers Day

Product.title: Monument™ Liner Lock
Product.description:
Based on one of Michael Walker’s favorite designs.

Few names in knifemaking command as much reverence as Michael Walker. The jeweler-turned-knifemaker is a true master of his craft, known for his artistic and ornate designs that transcend the usual definition of a knife. This is why we’re extremely proud to bring you the Monument™, one of two Michael Walker designs available in a limited run.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP,Gift Guide

Product.title: Monument™ Liner Lock
Product.description:
Based on one of Michael Walker’s favorite designs.

Few names in knifemaking command as much reverence as Michael Walker. The jeweler-turned-knifemaker is a true master of his craft, known for his artistic and ornate designs that transcend the usual definition of a knife. This is why we’re extremely proud to bring you the Monument™, one of two limited edition Michael Walker designs.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP

Product.title: Pursue Liner Lock
Product.description:
Ready to pursue what’s next.

The Pursue is one of two limited-run CRKT® knives designed by visionary custom knifemaker Michael Walker. Inspired by one of Michael’s original zipper blade customs, it features a unique handle shape with an oversized pivot that tapers down to a slim end for a comfortable fit in the hand.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP

Product.title: Tuna Frame Lock
Product.description:
Built like a Bluefin.

With a profile that suggests strong forward momentum and a blade shape that looks like a deep-sea carnivore, the Tuna™ everyday carry folding knife slices through packages and boxes faster than a Bluefin slices through the swell on a taut line.
Product.categories: Folding Knives,Shop All,Everyday Carry,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: LCK + Liner Lock
Product.description:
Everyday carry meets black tie affair.

Matthew Lerch’s LCK + folding knife returns with upgraded materials and a fresh, all-black look. It starts with the titanium nitride-coated S35VN steel blade, which boasts improved toughness, exceptional wear resistance, and a razor-sharp edge. Move on to the handle and you’ll find marbled carbon fiber for a strong-but-lightweight feel, not to mention a striking appearance that accentuates the already sleek and elegant design.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Folding Knives,UPP,Shop All,New Releases,Gift Guide,Pocket

Product.title: Kalbi Liner Lock
Product.description:
An everyday carry evolution.

A member of the Crossbones family, the Kalbi is a versatile everyday carry knife that’s been upgraded with Japanese Acuto 440 blade steel for improved edge retention. The practical elegant design of the Crossbones returns, now with an un-missable blue aluminum handle that sets this knife apart as something special.
Product.categories: New Releases,Everyday Carry,Folding Knives,Shop All,Pocket,All products excluding UPP,Gift Guide

Product.title: Collet Pen Aluminum
Product.description:
Purpose-built for bold ideas.

Just a pen? Hardly. The Collet Pen is part writing instrument, part precision scribe multitool. Hidden beneath the back cap is a tungsten carbide tip scribe strong enough to mark most hard materials. It’s held in place by a collet chuck that can accept any manner of optional scribe implements.
Product.categories: Accessories,Getting Things Done,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Shop All,Pocket,Gift Guide

Product.title: Bot Deadbolt®
Product.description:
Like an extension of your hand.

Flavio Ikoma made the Bot to be the knife you reach for instinctively and use effortlessly. Designed to feel as natural in your hand as possible, it plugs into your subconscious, giving you immediate feedback and precise, almost automated control. And it’s built for speed, with Assisted Opening and IKBS™ bearings to propel the blade smoothly into position, where it’s held securely in place by a powerful Deadbolt® lock.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Folding Knives,UPP,Shop All,New Releases,Assisted

Product.title: A.B.C. (All. Bases. Covered.)
Product.description:
Engineered for rapid response time.

Jim Hammond’s A.B.C. (All. Bases. Covered.) makes its return in an even more versatile form. Now a folder, it brings the varied capabilities of the original fixed blade to a more convenient and compact design. And thanks to Assisted Opening and IKBS™ bearings, it’s still ready to spring to action at a moment’s notice, while the G10 handle provides a strong grip even in adverse weather.
Product.categories: Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Getting Things Done,Shop All,New Releases

Product.title: P.S.D.™ II (Particle. Separation. Device.)
Product.description:
Fast, powerful, portable.

Jim Hammond’s original P.S.D.™ earned its name (Particle. Separation. Device.) for its ability to cut through just about anything, anywhere. The P.S.D.™ II brings that same capability to a smaller, more portable folding knife, shaving over an inch off the total length. You’ll still find a corrosion-resistant, full-recurve blade and Assisted Opening with IKBS™ bearings for fast and easy one-handed operation, but now in an improved form factor for everyday carry.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Assisted,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Shop All

Product.title: Redemption® Crossbar Lock
Product.description:
Old West character meets modern utility.

The Redemption® is based on legendary knifemaker Ken Onion’s Deadman’s Hand custom, a tribute to the knives carried by the outlaws and poker players of the Wild West, and named after the aces-and-eights hand Wild Bill Hickok purportedly held at the time of his death. The Redemption® brings this classic folder into the modern age and is Ken’s first CRKT knife to incorporate a Crossbar Lock. Made in the U.S.A. in collaboration with Hogue Knives, it uses CPM MagnaCut blade steel for incredible strength and edge retention.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,UPP,Folding Knives,New Releases,Shop All,Made in USA,Gift Guide,Best Sellers,Pocket,Front Page New Releases

Product.title: Schmidt® Megaline 4876 M Refill
Product.description: The SCHMIDT® pressurized ball point refill cartridge enables not only writing upside down, but also in the most extreme environmental conditions at high speeds. The air tight system gives these refills a literally unlimited shelf-life. They are equipped with a stainless steel tip manufactured with the upmost precision as well as special ink pastes developed exclusively for SCHMIDT® MegaLine pressurized refills.
Product.categories: Accessories,Shop All,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Fortuitous™ Liner Lock
Product.description:
Fortune favors the bold.

From acclaimed custom knifemaker Michael Walker comes the Fortuitous™, a pair of limited-run folders manufactured in Italy in collaboration with Lionsteel®. This model features MagnaCut blade steel that delivers exceptional edge retention and a titanium handle for lightweight strength. Finished in a flourish of artistic detail that evokes Michael’s custom designs. As beautiful as it is rare.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP,Shop All,Gift Guide

Product.title: MinimalX™ Frame Lock
Product.description:
Power in simplicity.

Designed by Darriel Caston of D Rocket Design, the MinimalX™ is an evolution of a knife originally made for SpaceX to commemorate a rocket launch. Darriel’s work caught the eye of someone in the company who commissioned him to make a custom series of knives for the crew. The MinimalX™ is all about fitting as much strength and durability into as small a package as possible, for a capable everyday carry you can take anywhere—even to outer space.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Folding Knives,New Releases,All products excluding UPP,Shop All,Gift Guide,Best Sellers,Pocket,Front Page New Releases

Product.title: Clever Girl™ Fixed
Product.description:
Move with the instincts of a velociraptor.

The tactical, fixed-blade Clever Girl™ can help you claw your way out of hairy situations with its powerful, upswept blade. This version adds additional utility in the form of Veff Serrations™ to easily saw through things like rope, and a marbled G10 handle for added flair and all-weather grip functionality.


Austin McGlaun's charity of choice for this knife is the Green Beret Foundation.


Established in 2016, the Forged by War® program spearheaded a collaboration between CRKT and Veterans, inviting real life warriors to apply their knowledge and experience to design a specialty line of mission-ready knives and tools. In addition to receiving commission on their designs, a portion of the profits are donated to the Veterans’ charity of choice. CRKT is proud to offer this dedicated collection to support the participating charities on a national level.
Product.categories: Getting Things Done,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Forged By War,Gift Guide

Product.title: Pursue Liner Lock
Product.description:
Ready to pursue what’s next.

The Pursue is one of two limited-run CRKT® knives designed by visionary custom knifemaker Michael Walker. Inspired by one of Michael’s original zipper blade customs, it features a unique handle shape with an oversized pivot that tapers down to a slim end for a comfortable fit in the hand.

The Pursue is available in two color variations, with this model featuring a Super Dense Twist™ Damasteel® blade and a blue Fat Carbon Dark Matter handle. Both feature a mother of pearl pivot. The lightweight folder is easy to open and close in one hand thanks to both IKBS™ bearings and a liner lock, one of Michael’s many transformative inventions that has been adopted by knifemakers everywhere.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP,Shop All

Product.title: Fortuitous™ Liner Lock
Product.description:
Fortune favors the bold.

From acclaimed custom knifemaker Michael Walker comes the Fortuitous™, a pair of limited-run folders manufactured in Italy in collaboration with Lionsteel®. This model features a Rose™ Damasteel® blade for superior cutting performance and striking looks, with a titanium handle for lightweight strength. Finished in a flourish of artistic detail that evokes Michael’s custom designs. As beautiful as it is rare.
Product.categories: Grail Hunting,New Releases,UPP,Shop All

Product.title: Mbombo™ Frame Lock
Product.description:
From ancient mythology to the last frontier.

Knife designer Darriel Caston named the Mbombo™ after a Kuba god of creation and based the design on a custom knife he was commissioned to make for the crew of a SpaceX mission. With a Damascus steel cleaver blade that propels open like a rocket and a sleek titanium handle that glides into a pocket, its unique design and capability make it a suitable EDC for any environment, from urban to outer space.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Shop All,New Releases,Gift Guide

Product.title: Stylus™ Frame Lock
Product.description:
Exacting precision, exquisite style.

From world-renowned custom knifemaker Ken Onion, the Stylus™ is a lightweight and low-profile pocket knife that deftly balances form and function. This version offers upgraded materials compared to the Stylus™ Assisted, including a titanium handle and powerful CPM® S35VN™ blade steel, and forgoes assisted opening for a classic feel.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,New Releases,Folding Knives,UPP,Gift Guide,Shop All,Pocket

Product.title: Nirk™ Tighe 2 Klecker Lock
Product.description:
Once your eyes lock on to the artistry in the skeletonized handle, you begin to see the true purity of the NIRK™ Tighe 2 form. Select from either the original NIRK™ Tighe, or the new smaller sized NIRK™ Tighe 2 to get the ultimate in mechanical simplicity masterfully designed into a knife form that takes metal work to a whole new level.

Brian Tighe and Glenn Klecker reinterpreted the Klecker NIRK™ custom folder with stainless steel being stamped and machined into a very dynamic, functional design. The steel frame is not only visually exciting, but offers a formidable cutting tool handle as well. Glenn's patent pending integral Lock Back mechanics are such that, the tighter you grip the handle—the stronger the blade lock-up. Brian's drop point blade design flows nicely from the handle shape, and its subtle recurve along the cutting edge is a nice touch as well. To keep the blade action smooth, a specially caged mini ball bearing system affords fast and smooth operation. A custom removable stainless steel clothing/gear clip is provided.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Pocket,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,On Sale

Product.title: Jumbones Frame Lock
Product.description:
When student becomes master.

In 2018, Jeff Park—under the tutelage of Ken Onion—released his first production knife, the Crossbones everyday carry folder. It won Blade Show’s coveted Knife of the Year award. Now, it’s back and it’s big. Really big.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,All products excluding UPP,Folding Knives,Shop All,On Sale

Product.title: M4™-02 Drop Point
Product.description:
Custom knife maker and Knife makers' Guild member Kit Carson is widely known for his M16® design.

This Kit Carson production designed M4™-02 lightweight knife model features white bone scales and contrasting black G10 bolsters, hand contoured like a Carson custom. This model features Outburst® assisted opening. The Outburst mechanism instantly brings the blade fully open after you have manually opened the blade approximately 30 degrees. M4 models have dual thumb studs for ambidextrous one-hand opening and bronze bearings and lubrous washers at the adjustable blade pivot for smooth, fast action.
Product.categories: Assisted,Everyday Carry,All products excluding UPP,Shop All,Pocket,On Sale

Product.title: A.P.C. (Always. Pocket. Carry.)
Product.description:
A new-fashioned twist on a classic carry.

Available in a limited run, the A.P.C. (Always. Pocket. Carry.) is an updated take on the classic slip joint folding knife. Created by seasoned knifemaker Ken Steigerwalt, the A.P.C. is crafted from premium materials—like M390 blade steel and a handsome Fat Carbon Dark Matter handle—with an improved slip joint design that prevents galling and reduces the overall weight of the knife. The traditional details, like the nail nick for easy opening, are complemented by its high tech features that make it lightweight, compact, and ready for action.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Pocket,Exclusives

Product.title: Persian Assisted
Product.description:
An everyday carry that’s ahead of the curve.

The Persian is a low-profile folding knife with subtle curves and a balanced design. Thanks to Assisted Opening, the D2 steel blade deploys in a flash, while the knife’s upswept shape and pronounced belly gives it improved slicing capability. Crafted from quality materials, the glass-reinforced nylon handle allows for better grip, making the Persian easy to open and close in one hand. All in all, it’s a sleek and durable carry for daily use that you’ll be proud to have in your pocket.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Assisted

Product.title: Michaca™ Automatic
Product.description:
A homegrown, high-caliber scale release automatic for everyday use.

Made in the USA, the Michaca™ is an automatic folding knife with a scale release lock designed by expert knifemaker Philip Booth. Crafted from ultra-premium materials, the drop point blade is made from best-in-class MagnaCut steel with a stonewash finish, while the black G10 handle offers excellent grip—and sports Booth’s signature stripe. It’s an automatic everyday carry with a dose of style. And the name? It’s a portmanteau of Booth’s hometown, Ithaca, Michigan.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,UPP,Automatic,Folding Knives,Shop All,New Releases,Made in USA,Out of Stock

Product.title: Michaca™ Automatic
Product.description:
A homegrown, high-caliber scale release automatic for everyday use.

Made in the USA, the Michaca™ is an automatic folding knife with a scale release lock designed by expert knifemaker Philip Booth. Crafted from ultra-premium materials, the drop point blade is made from best-in-class MagnaCut steel with a bead blast finish, while the natural G10 handle offers excellent grip—and sports Booth’s signature stripe. It’s an automatic everyday carry with a dose of style. And the name? It’s a portmanteau of Booth’s hometown of Ithaca, Michigan.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Automatic,Folding Knives,Shop All,UPP,New Releases,Made in USA,Front Page New Releases,Out of Stock

Product.title: Drifter Liner Lock
Product.description:
Never drift off course.

Much like the original fan-favorite Drifter, this knife is a go-to everyday carry that can take a beating and won’t let you down. Now with D2 blade steel, it features improved edge retention that can withstand long-term wear and tear. Add in the all-weather grip of the G10 handle, the one-handed operation of the easy-to-use flipper and a strong liner lock, and you’ve got a well-rounded knife ready for a wide variety of tasks.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Pocket,Shop All,Folding Knives,New Releases,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Forebear Slip Joint
Product.description:
A contemporary knife steeped in tradition.

The Forebear is an everyday carry with a classic slip joint mechanism based on a pivotal, centuries-old design that remains popular to this day. Built to handle cutting tasks of all sizes, it features a two-blade design with larger and smaller Wharncliffe blades that open at opposite ends of the handle. Crafted from quality materials, the blades use 12C27 steel with a nail nick for easy opening and the handle is made of G10 for excellent all-weather grip. All in all, it’s a strong and lightweight folding knife with a time-honored design.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Pocket,Folding Knives,New Releases,All products excluding UPP,Shop All

Product.title: Padawan Frame Lock
Product.description:
Introducing: the Padawan.

Why name it the Padawan? As an apprentice to renowned knifemaker Flavio Ikoma—known to some as the “Master”—Buzetti's role as “padawan” was the perfect inspiration to debut his first design. Pedro Buzetti’s first knife design with CRKT, this capable folding knife was crafted for form and function, with a drop point blade made from 14C28N steel, and a handsome micarta overlay on the handle for improved grip. The frame lock was modified to keep the blade secure, and the clip lets the knife sit low in the pocket.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases

Product.title: Bear Claw™ Fixed
Product.description:
River knife. Rescue knife. Whatever you call it, it gets the job done.

The Bear Claw™ is a compact fixed blade knife that features a blunt tip, preventing point penetration, making it a safer carry around rafts and inflatables. The hawkbill blade is made with corrosion-resistant steel and lined with Veff Serrations™ that deliver effortless cuts, making quick work of ropes and straps. Over the years, the Bear Claw™ has become the go-to favorite among whitewater rafters, river guides, water sports enthusiasts, and emergency response personnel. The bright orange handle has a finger retention hole that makes it secure to hold in wet conditions, while the sheath comes with multiple mounting options for quick access in emergency situations—so you can focus on the task at hand.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Front Page New Releases

Product.title: Squid™ XM
Product.description:
It’s back. But bigger.

The Squid™ XM is a versatile everyday carry just like its predecessor, but with a bit more reach from a longer blade—it’s not quite large, just “extra medium.” With a grippy G10 handle and new, earth brown color, it’s a highly functional design that’s a surprisingly capable EDC. Featuring a D2 steel drop-point blade, the knife achieves an excellent balance of tip strength and point geometry for maximum utility. When you’re ready to put it to work, Assisted Opening deploys the blade in the blink of an eye. IKBS™ ball bearings in the pivot create a super smooth action.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,XM,Squid,Pocket,New Releases,Folding Knives,Assisted,All products excluding UPP,Shop All

Product.title: Bear Claw™ Fixed
Product.description:
Same intuitive design. Sharper claw.

This iteration of the Bear Claw™ knife has the same profile as the original with a new needle-sharp tip specifically designed for piercing tasks, making it useful on everyday outdoor excursions and as a personal safety tool. The hawkbill blade is made with corrosion-resistant steel and has a straight edge for easy sharpening. The textured handle has a finger retention hole making it fit well in your palm, and the sheath comes with multiple mounting options for easy access in emergency situations—so you can focus on the task at hand.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases

Product.title: Homefront™ Compact
Product.description:
The looks of a classic WWII knife with the fit and finish of a modern favorite.

A high-end version of the impressive original, Ken Onion’s Homefront™ Compact is a distinguished folding knife with a liner lock. It has a shorter drop point blade made of premium S35VN steel and includes details like a traditional non-assisted flipper opening and a lanyard hole for easy fob customization. Contrasted with the light G10 handle, the black blade in a DLC finish gives this everyday carry a look that commands attention.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases

Product.title: Ancestor Liner Lock
Product.description:
Descended from greatness. Destined for more.

A nod to the iconic knives that came before it, the Ancestor is a folding knife that balances old-fashioned style with modern convenience. Made from tough D2 blade steel, the knife is ready for hard use, with improved slicing capabilities thanks to the upswept tanto profile—a shape that originated in another millennium. The liner lock and IKBS™ ball bearings ensure safe and smooth action, while the G10 handle has excellent grip and comes in a striking pattern that’s reminiscent of classic wood or gemstone. The Ancestor is an everyday carry that you’ll be reaching for today, tomorrow, and years to come.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Folding Knives,New Releases,All products excluding UPP,Shop All

Product.title: BoltLiner Pen
Product.description:
Your job’s too important for a drugstore pen.

Bring along a pen that sticks around. New to the Techliner family, the BoltLiner pen is a quick-draw take on the can’t-go-without-it original. The machined grid surface gives the pen solid grip, while the stainless-steel handle provides excellent durability. Thanks to the bolt action mechanism, the pen deploys in an instant, making opening and closing easy and smooth. It’s a different kind of everyday carry, but one that you’ll want in your pocket nonetheless.

Product.title: Ibis Frame Lock
Product.description:
Ancient symbol. Cultural icon. Stunning knife.

Inspired by the elegant wading bird, the Ibis is an everyday carry folding knife with a subtle curve along the spine of the blade, giving the knife a distinctive profile. Made with 14C28N steel, the drop point blade has a prominent belly for ample cutting edge and is well-suited for slicing tasks. Between the stonewash finish on the blade and G10 handle one could call ibis-egg blue, this edc is a striking tribute to a majestic bird. To quote Lucas Burnley on his inspired design: “It just looks good.”
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,New Releases,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,Shop All,Out of Stock

Product.title: CEO Microflipper
Product.description:
This young executive isn’t done making moves.

The smallest version of the renowned CEO folding knife family, the Microflipper combines refined style and ultimate convenience. It may be small, but it’s a serious contender for any job thanks to a lightweight aluminum handle and a tough D2 steel blade. This sleek small pocket knife comes with a drop point blade and aluminum handle in an all-black finish—dressed to impress in and out of, the office.

Product.title: Squid™ Compact
Product.description:
This small knife is a big deal.

A smaller, more agile version of the perfect edc knife, the Squid™ Compact is dependable and remarkably capable. It’s loaded with features usually reserved for larger knives and includes both a thumb stud and flipper for two ergonomic opening options. Whichever you choose, the blade deploys quickly and smoothly thanks to Assisted Opening and IKBS™ ball bearings in the pivot. This model features D2 blade steel and a blue G10 handle for a pop of color that stands out and is easy to find.

Product.title: M16®-01DZ Spear Point
Product.description:
Conquer civilian tasks with a proven design.

The popular M16® knife series comes from a long line of military-grade tools—and the M16®-01DZ folding knife is no exception. This spear point blade is made of durable D2 steel and the automated liner safety provides an extra layer of lock security. The signature Carson Flipper and IKBS™ ball bearings in the pivot ensure smooth opening and closing, making it intuitive in the hand. Now available in the desert tan colorway, the M16®-01DZ is a standout everyday carry that’s simple, tough, and designed to be put to use.
Product.categories: All products excluding UPP,Folding Knives,Shop All,New Releases,M16,M16-01

Product.title: Padawan Frame Lock
Product.description:
Never underestimate an apprentice.

Introducing: the Padawan. Pedro Buzetti’s first design with CRKT, this capable folding knife is available in two versions. The 6075 was made for utility, with a Wharncliffe blade made from 14C28N steel and a G10 overlay on the handle to withstand heavy use. The frame lock was modified to keep the blade secure and prevent over-traveling, and the clip lets the knife sit low in the pocket. Why name it the Padawan? As an apprentice of renowned knifemaker Flavio Ikoma—known to some as the “Master”—Buzetti's role as “padawan” was the perfect inspiration to debut his first design.
Product.categories: Everyday Carry,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases,Front Page New Releases

Product.title: Pilar® III Frame Lock
Product.description:
Where minimal design meets maximum utility.

The Pilar® III with D2 blade steel transforms the minimalist’s sailor tool into a distinctly urban everyday carry folding knife, while keeping intact the spirit of the classic and epic tale behind its name – Hemingway’s adventure boat was the Pilar. The Earth Brown G10 handle contributes to the knife’s understated looks and provides exceptional grip.
Product.categories: Frame Lock,Pilar,Pocket,Shop All,Folding Knives,All products excluding UPP

Product.title: Provoke® Grivory®
Product.description:
Serve. Protect.

The Provoke™ Grivory® morphing karambit knife draws on ancient design but it’s hiding a futuristic secret. The first knife ever to feature Kinematic® technology, it stays neatly tucked away in transit and comes to life when there’s trouble afoot. This version is built with red Grivory®—a strong, lightweight, engineered thermoplastic—making it more lightweight, adept, and crafted to go anywhere.

How Kinematic® Works

Nudge the upper crossbar with your thumb—while the rest of your fingers firmly grasp the handle—and the blade lunges to life and locks into place. Shift the discrete lever at the base of the finger loop and the blade retreats into its closed position.
Product.categories: Grivory,Provoke,Folding Knives,Shop All,UPP,New Releases

Product.title: Orca Assisted
Product.description:
They call it a killer whale for a reason.

Inspired by his favorite animal, Jim Hammond designed the Orca to be powerful, stealthy, and quick—resulting in a small and unassuming folding knife that hides surprising capability. The drop point blade opens in an instant thanks to Assisted Opening, and the D2 blade steel provides excellent edge retention. It can fit into the smallest pockets thanks to its compact size, and stylistically resembles the marine mammal with smooth curves and details that look like dorsal and pectoral fins of the Orcinus Orca.

Product.title: Minnow Automatic
Product.description:
Sometimes it’s good to be the little fish.

Made in the USA, the Minnow is an everyday carry that’s swift, sturdy, and—you guessed it—small. The automatic button release deploys the blade with lightning speed, while the best-in-class MagnaCut steel offers incredible strength and edge retention. Fully opened, the compact profile measures just under 4.5 inches, with a small blade designed for legal carry in states like California. To top it off, the green linen micarta handle gives it an elegant finish, making this one little fish that stands out from the shoal.

Product.title: Bear Claw™ Fixed
Product.description:
River knife. Rescue knife. Whatever you call it, it gets the job done.

A favorite among whitewater rafters, water sports enthusiasts, and emergency response personnel, the Bear Claw™ is a compact fixed blade knife with a blunt tip, preventing point penetration and making it a safer carry—especially around rafts and inflatables. The hawkbill blade is made with corrosion-resistant steel and lined with Veff Serrations™ that deliver effortless cuts, making quick work of ropes and straps. The textured handle has a finger retention hole that makes the Bear Claw™ knife easy to hold onto in wet conditions, while the sheath comes with multiple mounting options for quick access in emergency situations—so you can focus on the task at hand.
Product.categories: Pursuing Adventure,Shop All,Fixed Blade Knives,All products excluding UPP,New Releases

Product.title: M16®-10DZ Tanto
Product.description:
Admire it—then put it to work.

From the popular M16® knife series, the M16®-10DZ is an everyday carry knife designed to be used, just like the tactical version that inspired it. The tanto-style blade with Veff Serrations™ gives it extra bite, making effortless cuts through ropes and fibrous materials, while the automated liner safety offers an extra layer of lock security. The signature Carson Flipper and IKBS™ bearings ensure smooth opening and closing every time, making it intuitive in the hand. Now available in desert tan, this folding knife is ready for the line of duty—in whatever capacity you see fit.
